title: Twitter rolling out pinned direct messages to everyone
content:
Twitter has the same basic messaging features as most other social networks, but direct messaging on the platform is still a long way off from the capabilities of Facebook Messenger, iMessage, Discord, or other competitors. Thankfully, one new feature is rolling out that brings it a step closer: the ability to pin DM conversations. Twitter

The post Twitter rolling out pinned direct messages to everyone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The ability to pin direct message conversations was previously exclusive to Twitter Blue, but now it's available for everyone.
